doc.after: Bird migration is the regular seasonal movement often north and south along a flyway between breeding and wintering grounds Many species of bird migrate Migration carries high costs in predation and mortality including from hunting by humans Migration is driven primarily by availability of food It occurs mainly in the northern hemisphere where birds are funnelled on to specific routes by natural barriers such as the Mediterranean Sea or the Caribbean Sea
